notes.text: You can now use the context menu to expand or collapse a node in a tree table
We now ensure the correct selection mode is set in all tables
We now check for the first field that is visible on the action parameter dialog and correctly focus on it
We now ensure that the application works correctly when the personalization settings of a chart are set to false
You can now override the text in the action confirmation popover for a specific action and entity set
We now ensure that the singletonPathVisitor annotation can be used to configure the visibility of the custom action buttons in the list report page
We've resolved an issue where charts configured with a relative metaPath and contextPath didn't load
We now provide a scrollThreshold setting for tables
We now support defining a field with value help by using a specific property of the singleton entity
We now support 1:N filtering in the P13n personalization dialog for tables
We now ensure that the implicit semantic object mappings containing sensitive data are not passed to the target application
Weâ€™ve now resolved the issue with filters not being removed using chart personalization
We've resolved an issue where the recently entered values popover incorrectly appears empty when no filters are applied
We now consider the custom aggregate property as aggregatable in charts
We now ensure that sorting works correctly in tree tables
We no longer truncate links inside contact fields
We now ensure that back-end errors in the upload table are always displayed
We now ensure that in apps using inline creation mode, the empty row is added to the bottom of the table when the end user modifies a column
We've now resolved an issue with the pending $metadata request when using the CollectionRoot property within the ValueList annotation
We've resolved an issue where the Chart building block didn't load in extension fragments
The tree table now supports pasting a node as a root node
We now ensure that the copy action enablement considers the OperationAvailable annotation
We've resolved an issue in the object page that occurred when the end user removed a section by adding a null check at the section layout access point
We no longer show an error message for a chart when the same property is marked as both groupable and aggregatable with a custom aggregation method
